name: 30 minutes challenge - GameMaker
description:
This is a little project, because I wanted to try something like this. Fun fact: This was supposed to be one hour challenge, but I had main game idea finished in under 25 minutes and I didn't want to bother with graphics, so I kept it like that (actually, I can't draw so I woudn't make it anyway.). It isn't too much polished, though. I might update this game, adding graphics, more featurec, etc in future.

Controls

Movement: WASD

Game restart after Game Over: [SPACE]
